meanings.definition: Failure to enforce a rule or law.
meanings.sent1: The nonenforcement of speed limits led to chaos on the roads.
meanings.sent2: The nonenforcement of parking regulations resulted in cars blocking the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The nonenforcement of the 'no running' rule at the pool made it a sprinting competition.
meanings.sent4: The nonenforcement of the noise ordinance turned the neighborhood into a concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The nonenforcement of the dress code made the school look like a costume party.

meanings.definition: The act of not carrying out enforcement.
meanings.sent1: The nonenforcement of building codes led to unsafe structures.
meanings.sent2: The nonenforcement of security measures left the building vulnerable to break-ins.
meanings.sent3: The nonenforcement of the 'no pets allowed' policy resulted in a zoo in the office.
meanings.sent4: The nonenforcement of safety protocols turned the workplace into a hazard zone.
meanings.sent5: The nonenforcement of attendance policies made the classroom feel like a ghost town.
